message:
### Error updating database.  Cause: com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlDataTruncation: Data truncation: Data too long for column 'sys_client_id' at row 1
### The error may involve com.lanswon.authserver.dao.SysSignupInfoMapper.insert-Inline
### The error occurred while setting parameters
### SQL: INSERT INTO sys_signup_info  ( sys_client_id,sys_name,sys_index,sys_password,crt_date,sys_note ) VALUES( ?,?,?,?,?,? )
### Cause: com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlDataTruncation: Data truncation: Data too long for column 'sys_client_id' at row 1
; Data truncation: Data too long for column 'sys_client_id' at row 1; nested exception is com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlDataTruncation: Data truncation: Data too long for column 'sys_client_id' at row 1
